duties_responsibilities.duty: Teach and engage with 4-year-old children in a classroom setting, providing a nurturing learning environment.
Collaborate with co-teacher to develop and implement age-appropriate curriculum and activities.
Effectively communicate with parents in English to provide updates on children's progress and address any concerns.
Utilize 2-3 years of classroom experience to create engaging and effective teaching methods and strategies.
Facilitate a bilingual (Spanish/English) classroom environment to support language development in young children.
